reviews.review_title: What are you waiting for to order your fragrances?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My acquaintances had recommended it to me, so l bought the three fragrances they had available at that time. The truth is that I was impressed by the quality of Boris perfumes. Their fragrance lasts all day, and the cream has a very moisturizing consistency without leaving the body greasy. The Bath Bodysuit is spectacular, as it leaves you with a pleasant scent even before applying the perfume, making the product last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product because it lets you try three products at a great value without buying the full size version. The body wash makes your skin so smooth and smells amazing my shower smells like the inside of a sol de Janeiro store spray. The beja flor body wash paired with the matching cream not only makes you smell like a  bed of flowers but makes your skin smooth and hydrated. I will admit I was hesitant at buying this because I have always thought 68 was too strong of a scent but I think once you are wearing it the scent evens out and is not as alcohol-y. I also love how these items are big enough to get many uses yet small enough to fit in your backpack or purse. Definitely recommend this product if you are scared to try a new scent or 68 in general, I think it is worth the price and definitely worth a try.
